CustomField.description: Reference to Customer Item XREF Map Flag for verizon.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL( NokiaCPQ_Item_Type__c, ''), ISPICKVAL( NokiaCPQ_Item_Type__c, 'Service'), ISPICKVAL( CPQ_Secondary_Category__c , 'AAPL'),ISPICKVAL( CPQ_Secondary_Category__c , 'CUST PROVIDED'), ISPICKVAL( CPQ_Secondary_Category__c , 'NONTRADE')) , 'N', 'Y')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Reference to Customer Item XREF Map Flag for verizon.
CustomField.label: Map Flag (XREF)
